title: Fix username display to show profile username instead of principal-like identifier

requirements.text: Fix user profile lookup so the app can reliably resolve a Principal to a UserProfile username, instead of falling back to showing a principal-like identifier (e.g., "67jkd-p6hqj-...") when rendering authors.
acceptanceCriteria: `useGetUserProfile(user: string)` constructs a real Principal value from the provided text (e.g., via the Principal utility) before calling `actor.getUserProfile(...)`, rather than using an ad-hoc `{ toString: () => user } as any` object.
When a valid profile exists for an author, `useGetUserProfile` returns it (not `null`) and UI components can display `profile.username`.
If the input `user` string is invalid/unparseable, the query does not crash the app and returns `null` (so UI can use a fallback).

requirements.text: Update the main plushie feed post UI to display the author’s saved username (from the user profile) instead of a truncated principal string.
acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx`, the author display name uses `useGetUserProfile(post.author.toString())` and shows `authorProfile.username` when available.
In `frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx`, the avatar fallback initials are derived from `authorProfile.username` when available, otherwise fall back to principal-derived initials.
When no user profile exists for the author, the UI continues to show a safe fallback (e.g., truncated principal) without layout breakage.

requirements.text: Update comment and group post/comment UIs to display the commenter/author’s saved username (from the user profile) instead of truncated principal strings, matching the behavior already used in Collection/Discussion post cards.
acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/CommentsSection.tsx`, each comment row resolves `comment.author` to a profile and displays `profile.username` when available (with a fallback if not).
In `frontend/src/components/GroupPostCard.tsx`, the group post author name resolves to `profile.username` when available (with a fallback if not).
In `frontend/src/components/GroupCommentsSection.tsx`, each group comment author name resolves to `profile.username` when available (with a fallback if not).
All user-facing strings introduced/modified for this change are in English.

constraints: Do not edit any files under `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, or anything under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose existing components instead).
Backend must remain single-actor; only create `backend/migration.mo` if a state upgrade is strictly required (it should not be required for this change).
nonGoals: Adding a new username system or changing username validation rules.
Introducing third-party auth providers or any non-Internet-Identity authentication.
Backend schema changes for user profiles (username/bio) unless proven necessary to fix the display issue.
